Uses of Class
org.xbib.io.compress.BufferRecycler

  • Packages that use BufferRecycler 
    Package Description
    org.xbib.io.compress  
    org.xbib.io.compress.lzf
    Package that contains public API of the LZF codec, as well as some of implementation, specifically parts are designed to be overridable.

    • Uses of BufferRecycler in org.xbib.io.compress

      Fields in org.xbib.io.compress with type parameters of type BufferRecycler 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static ThreadLocal<SoftReference<BufferRecycler>> BufferRecycler._recyclerRef
      This ThreadLocal contains a SoftReference to a BufferRecycler used to provide a low-cost buffer recycling for buffers we need for encoding, decoding.
      Methods in org.xbib.io.compress that return BufferRecycler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BufferRecycler BufferRecycler.instance()
      Accessor to get thread-local recycler instance
